message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to make a fair offer to get the ball rolling. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1100000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1100000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm very interested in the product, and I'm willing to pay up to $850000.  Let's see if we can find a compromise.

Bob, I understand that $850000 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can see the value of the product to you, and I'm willing to make a compromise. I'm now offering the product to you for $950000. This is a fair price that takes into account your budget and the value you've placed on the product.
